about_the_game:
As a youthful offender, sent to a place called the Soul Mirror Relics, where he encountered various and sundry "Reflecting Layer." When the mirror reflected past memories, after witnessing a myriad of people and events, whether to let go, whether to live or die, whether to accept or not, are all endings

"Soul Mirror Relics" is a narrative-driven turn-based RPG game, The quality of a game cannot be fully assessed from just a few sentences; experiencing it is the best introduction. The first two chapters of the game are available for free play.

Game Features:

  • No Random Enemy Encounters - You can avoid battling most enemies on the map by  movement. good luck

  • Multiple Playable Characters - A plethora of available skills, enemies, and bosses.

  • Numerous Enemy Counter and Counter-Counter Effects

  • A Few Random Easter Eggs

content_descriptors.notes: Note: The game contains some depictions of gore, bizarre content, as well as scenes related to drug abuse, suicide, and death, which may not be suitable for everyone. Additionally, there are some bright and flashing scenes. Players with photosensitive epilepsy should use discretion when playing.
